## Representacion Grafica 

```{r}
x <- seq(-20,20,0.05)
length(x)
par(bg = "#E1D6D4", col="#4770A5", pch = ".")
plot(x,x*sin(x), xlab = expression(x), ylab = expression(sin(x)), main = "Funcion de Grafico",type = "b", lty = 2)
```
